item.title: 如何给不同theme的Hugo添加评论系统gitalk
item.author: Ylimhs
item.description: gitalk 官方demo环境 gitalk github地址 运行效果 1 2 #评论是调用github的api来完成的，不依赖第三方 https://api.github.com/repos/yourrepo/issues? 1. 创建 Github Application 如果没有applicati

item.title: hugo搭建
item.author: Ylimhs
item.description: brew https://brew.sh/ brew Linux安装文档 https://docs.brew.sh/Homebrew-on-Linux 前期准备 debian或者Ubuntu 1 sudo apt-get install build-essential procps curl file git 开始安装 1 /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" 环境变量配置 1 2 3 4 test -d ~/.linuxbrew && eval $(~/.linuxbrew/bin/brew shellenv) test -d /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew
